description:
As a merchant,
I want to add and edit new products in my shop.

As a merchant,
I want to prevent new orders during my holidays.

As a visitor,
I want to see the list of featured products.

As a customer,
I want to edit my postal and bank details.

As a loyal customer,
I want to receive gift suggestions by email.

As a visitor,
I want to indicate a wish on social networks.

As a customer,
I want to pay by Paypal, Visa, bank transfer or check.

As a visitor,
I want to search for gifts by price.

As a visitor,
I want to search for gifts according to a theme, colors and materials.

As a customer,
I want to obtain an invoice and a follow-up of my orders.

As a regular visitor or buyer,
I want to be able to create a customer account.

As a merchant,
I want key metrics on page views and visitor interests.

As a merchant,
I want a secure space to administer my site.

As a merchant,
I want to cancel any erroneous or fraudulent orders and proceed with compensation from the secure area.

As a visitor,
I want to submit ideas for items in the shop.
